metadata.title: Sum of Even Numbers 1 to 10 (Z--)
metadata.description:
Write a Z-- program that computes the sum of even numbers from 1 to 10 using a for loop and prints the result.

## Learning Objectives
- Loops (for)
- Conditional statements
- Using `print()`
- Understanding Z-- syntax
metadata.author: Z-Challenge Team

problem.statement:
Compute the sum of even numbers from 1 to 10 using a for loop and print the result in the format:

Sum of even numbers from 1 to 10: 
30.00

(Each value on its own line, as shown.)
problem.outputFormat:
First line: Sum of even numbers from 1 to 10: 
Second line: 30.00
problem.constraints: Use only Z-- syntax, a for loop, and an if statement.

examples.output:
Sum of even numbers from 1 to 10: 
30.00
examples.explanation: The program should output the label and the sum, each on its own line.

hints: Use a for loop to iterate from 1 to n.
Use an if statement to check if a number is even.
Add even numbers to the sum variable.

testCases.output:
Sum of even numbers from 1 to 10: 
30.00

editorial.approach: Use a for loop to iterate from 1 to n, check if each number is even, and add it to the sum. Print the result using Z-- syntax.
